name: kma-wol-app
description: Aplikacja Wake-on-LAN z podziaÅ‚em na frontend i backend

scripts.build: pnpm --filter kma-wol-backend build && pnpm --filter kma-wol-frontend build
scripts.build:all: pnpm run clean && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter kma-wol-backend clean && pnpm --filter kma-wol-frontend clean && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.rebuild: pnpm run clean && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.rebuild:dev: pnpm run rebuild && pnpm run dev
